rukus.text: Aap keh dijiye kay aey logo! Tum meray deen ki taraf say shak mein ho to mein inn maboodon ki ibadat nahi kerta jin ki tum Allah ko chor ker ibadat kertay ho lekin haan uss Allah ki ibadat kerta hun jo tumhari jaan qabz kerta hai. Aur mujh ko yeh hukum hua hai kay mein eman laney walon mein say hun
Aur yeh kay apna rukh yaksoo hoker (iss) deen ki taraf ker lena aur kabhi mushrikon mein say na hona
Aur Allah ko chor ker aisi cheez ki ibadat mat kerna jo tujh ko na koi nafa phoncha sakay aur na koi zarrar phoncha sakay. Phir agar aisa kiya to tum iss halat mein zalimon mein say ho jao gay

Aur agar tum ko Allah koi takleef phonchaye to ba-juz uss kay aur koi uss ko door kerney wala nahi hai aur agar woh tum ko koi khair phonchana chahaye to uss kay fazal ka koi hataney wala nahi woh apna fazal apney bandon mein say jiss per chahaye nichawar kerdey aur woh bari maghfirat bari rehmat wala hai

Aap keh dijiye kay aey logo! Tumharay pass haq tumharay rab ki taraf say phonch chuka hai iss liye jo shaks raah-e-raast per aajaye so woh apney wastay raah-e-raast per aaye ga aur jo shaks bey raah rahey ga uss ka bey raah hona ussi per paray ga aur mein tum per musallat nahi kiya gaya
Aur aap uss ki ittabaa kertay rahiye jo kuch aap kay pass wahee bheji jati hai aur sabar kijiye yahan tak kay Allah faisla ker dey aur woh sab faisla kerney walon mein acha hai
